data.instruction: Make a cross with two popsicle sticks.
data.tip: Don't chew on the popsicle sticks.

data.instruction: Stack five more popscicles on top of the cross.
Add a rubberband in the two specified locations.
data.tip: Continually band until the rubberband is tight.

data.instruction: Add another stick ontop of the cross.
Add two rubberbands in the shape of an X.
data.tip: Continually band until the rubberband is tight.

data.instruction: Rubberband the back of the sticks.
data.tip: Continually band until the rubberband is tight.

data.instruction: Tape bottlecap a half of an inch away from the end of the stick.
data.tip: Make sure the tape is secure before moving onto the next step.

data.instruction: You are done! Congratulations! Fire Away!
